Name: 世阳教你学防灾Shiyang teaches you to learn disaster prevention
About the game: Game introduction 'Disaster prevention simulator' is a science simulation game, the players control the game characters to walk or do something,then they can learn some knowledge about meteorological disaster prevention , such as snowstorm, dust storms, floods and other common sense. The game is constantly updated, the version has joined the voice ~ the story will continue to update ~
